attributes.action: Change the way insurance is handled. Insurance should be based on the car.
attributes.additional_details: This is an effective method for families and friends as they are able to share a car without paying for multiple insurances. This will also help with the cost of living crisis.
attributes.background: We want the government to change how insurance is handled. It should be based on the car. Other countries do it this way and it works.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

It is already possible to get car insurance that covers multiple drivers on the same car. Decisions about what car insurance products to offer are a matter for individual insurers, not the UK Government or Parliament.

We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Introduce fixed prices for car insurance based on power to weight ratio and age: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/646793
